T02D2779:149a-0: @149a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2779:149a-1: rab tu snga bar langs nas ni //
T02D2779:149a-2: dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yi //
T02D2779:149a-3: bum par brtson mdzad spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2779:149a-4: bzhu ba'i rgyun gyis lus bkru bya //
T02D2779:149a-5: dge ba'i khang bu dam par ni //
T02D2779:149a-6: brtse ldan skyes bu che rnams kyis //
T02D2779:149a-7: dul ba'i blo gros dran pa dang /
T02D2779:149a-8: bag yod dbang po rab bsdams pas //
T02D2779:149a-9: zhugs la sna tshogs mchod pa yi //
T02D2779:149a-10: rdzas rnams chal par bkram bya zhing //
T02D2779:149a-11: dri bsung bdug ba mchog gis bdugs /
T02D2779:149a-12: khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas bya //
T02D2779:149a-13: aom: aa bi ghanan sarba to sha pra han h'um phat /
T02D2779:149a-14: de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2779:149a-15: ji bzhin bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2779:149a-16: mchog rim pas sngon btang la //
T02D2779:149a-17: pha ti ka yi sbyor ba brtsam //
T02D2779:149a-18: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D2779:149a-20: brtson pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang po //
T02D2779:149b-0: skad cig tsam gyis @149b mdun du drang //
T02D2779:149b-1: shel ltar dri med yangs pa yi //
T02D2779:149b-2: pho brang rin chen sgron ma can //
T02D2779:149b-3: rab tu nyams dga' lha ma me ba //
T02D2779:149b-4: rgyan rnams kun gyis phun tshogs lha //
T02D2779:149b-5: rlung gis bskyod pa'i g-yer kha rab snyan bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
T02D2779:149b-6: bstan pa gang dag shin tu rnam nges rtag dang bde dang gtsang ba dang //
T02D2779:149b-7: bdag tu chags pa'i lta ba'i kun sel mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang dang //
T02D2779:149b-8: bdag med chos ston nam mkha'i mthar thug skye dgu'i snying rab sim byed bsam //
T02D2779:149b-9: dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi //
T02D2779:149b-10: gzhal med khang brtsegs dam pa dang //
T02D2779:149b-12: sku mdzes mang pos rab brgyan pa'o //
T02D2779:149b-13: khang bzangs re yang mchod pa yin //
T02D2779:149b-14: lha mo bcu drug bcu drug gis //
T02D2779:149b-15: mngon par rol byas rtag tu rtsen //
T02D2779:149b-16: thams cad ting 'dzin bskyed brtson pa'o //
T02D2779:149b-17: de yi phyi rol nye 'khor du //
T02D2779:149b-18: phyogs skyong bcu yi bu rnams kyis //
T02D2779:149b-19: brtson byas mchod pa'i sprin phung las //
T02D2779:149b-20: lus phyed mngon phyung btung pa'o //
T02D2779:149b-21: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
T02D2779:149b-22: smin mtshams mdzod spur byung ba yi //
T02D2779:149b-24: khang bzangs rgyal ba'i thugs bskul bya //
T02D2779:149b-25: 'di ltar rnam par g-yengs kun gyi //
T02D2779:149b-26: rtsa ba 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2779:149b-28: 'dzin pa mtha' dag spang bar bya //
T02D2779:149b-29: de 'dzin pa ni rnam bzhi ste //
T02D2779:149b-30: longs spyod bshes dang lus nyid dang //
T02D2779:149b-31: dge pa'i tshogs la mngon zhen pa'o //
T02D2779:149b-32: 'di dag gzhan gyi don du bsngo //
T02D2779:149b-33: de nas me long zla rgyas dang //
T02D2779:149b-34: dbang po'i gzhu dang 'od kyi khyim //
T02D2779:149b-35: ston gyi nam mkha'i gung rnams kyis //
T02D2779:149b-36: sbyor ba brtan pas rnam par bsgom //
T02D2779:149b-38: thogs med 'od dpag med nyid kyis //
T02D2779:149b-39: dbu brgyan hr'i: yig snying po can //
T02D2779:149b-40: smin mtshams nyi mas mtshan gyur blta /
T02D2779:149b-41: aom a'a: hr'i: ma ma tsi tra sa ma ya
T02D2779:149b-42: dhi badzra mu tra pra tyud ta phem phem phem
T02D2779:149b-43: dzva la dzva la dzva h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2779:149b-44: sngags 'di rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs //
T02D2779:149b-45: ting 'dzin dbab pa'i phyag rgyas te //
T02D2779:149b-47: thig le dkar 'tsher rdo rje'i rgyu //
T02D2779:149b-48: nyi ma'i zer gyis padmo dbye //
T02D2779:149b-49: thig le las ni 'od tshogs spro //
T02D2779:149b-50: de yis mun pa kun bsregs pas //
T02D2779:150a-0: thogs med bsam gtan rang byung @150a * //
